title: m101 Sporting News Supplement George Davis and Harry Pietz
author: Luke

posts.post_title: m101 Sporting News Supplement George Davis and Harry Pietz
posts.post_content:
I got this in a big lot years ago and have never really known what I paid or what it's worth.  Deciding to sell my larger items and stick to cards, so this is for sale.  Only problem is I don't know what it's worth.  I know taking offers is frowned upon on this site, but just this once, I'm going to do that.  If you have any past sale data you want to pass along with your offer, that would help.  Thanks.  

Also have Pietz in nicer condition.
Can you post the Pietz, please?
Thank you, that's a nice one.
